testcase.classname: Login functionality for Adactin web application
testcase.name: User verify for valid login credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User should launch the browser........................................passed And User hold for '3' seconds...............................................passed Then User should verify the Welcome to AdactIn Group of Hotels is displayed in the login page.passed When User enters the username in the login page.............................passed And User enters the password in the login page..............................passed And User clicks the Login button in the login page..........................passed And User hold for '3' seconds...............................................passed And User clicks the Logout button in home page..............................passed

testcase.classname: Login functionality for Adactin web application
testcase.name: User to verify whether the check-out date field accepts a later date than checkin date
testcase.system-out: Given User should launch the browser........................................passed And User hold for '3' seconds...............................................passed Then User should verify the Welcome to AdactIn Group of Hotels is displayed in the login page.passed When User enters the username in the login page.............................passed And User enters the password in the login page..............................passed And User clicks the Login button in the login page..........................passed And User hold for '3' seconds...............................................passed When User select the location using drop down...............................passed And User select the hotel using drop down...................................passed And User select the room type using drop down...............................passed And User select the no of rooms using drop down.............................passed And User enter the check-in date............................................passed And User enter the check-out date...........................................passed And User select the adult per room using drop down..........................passed And User select the children per room using drop down.......................passed And User clicks the search button...........................................passed Then User should verify the error message is displayed......................passed When User waits for '3' seconds.............................................passed And User clicks the Logout button in home page..............................passed
